tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE reports_on_energy_consumption ( 
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    location_id UUID, 
    report_date DATE, 
    energy_consumed DECIMAL, 
    cost_savings DECIMAL 
);

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id UUID,
    date DATE,
    energy_consumed DECIMAL,
    cost_saved DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE smart_lighting (
    location_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    lightbulb_model VARCHAR,
    power_consumption DECIMAL,
    dimmable BOOLEAN,
    energy_saving_percent DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    time TIME,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    energy_consumed DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE cost_savings (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    time TIME,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    cost_savings DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE smart_lights (
    light_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    status VARCHAR(20),
    energy_consumed DECIMAL(10, 2),
    cost_saved DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE smart_lighting_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    light_id INT,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    day_of_week CHAR(3)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    room_id INT,
    energy_consumed DECIMAL,
    cost DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE smart_lighting (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    room_id INT,
    lighting_type VARCHAR(50),
    wattage DECIMAL,
    status VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE room (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    room_name VARCHAR(50),
    building_id INT,
    floor_number INT
)

CREATE TABLE energy_savings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    cost_saved DECIMAL,
    percentage_saved DECIMAL,
    smart_lighting_id INT,
    date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE building (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_name VARCHAR(50),
    address VARCHAR(100),
    total_floors INT
)
